name: Maya Thompson
persona: Maya Thompson is a 21-year-old psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 2.96. She is moderately conscientious and has decent self-efficacy, though she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and staying consistently organized. Maya is motivated to achieve higher grades and shows perseverance, often bouncing back from setbacks. While she experiences some test anxiety, she manages it reasonably well and is determined to improve her academic performance. Maya balances her studies with part-time work, which sometimes makes time management a challenge.
